name: FREE California Permit Test 8 - Real 2025 DMV Test Questions

about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

comment.text: School crossing.
Pedestrian crossing.
Jogging trail.
Pedestrian crossing.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions

hasPart.name: This white sign means you:
hasPart.assesses: This white sign means you: | This white sign means you: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

suggestedAnswer.text: May turn left only on a green arrow.

comment.text: May turn left only on a green arrow.

suggestedAnswer.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

comment.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

suggestedAnswer.text: Must wait for the solid green light before you turn left.

comment.text: Must wait for the solid green light before you turn left.

acceptedAnswer.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

comment.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

answerExplanation.text: A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

comment.text: This white sign means you: | A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

hasPart.name: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive?

about.name: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? | Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

comment.text: Tranquilizers, marijuana, and sedatives.

suggestedAnswer.text: Cough syrups and cold tablets containing codeine or antihistamines.

comment.text: Cough syrups and cold tablets containing codeine or antihistamines.
All of the above.
All of the above.

answerExplanation.text: A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

comment.text: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? | A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

hasPart.name: This sign is a warning that you are approaching:

about.name: This sign is a warning that you are approaching:

hasPart.assesses: This sign is a warning that you are approaching: | This sign is a warning that you are approaching: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A round sign means you are approaching a railroad crossing. This sign is posted a few hundred feet in front of the tracks and tells drivers to slow down, look, listen, and prepare to stop.

comment.text: An intersection.
A crosswalk.
A railroad crossing.
A railroad crossing.

answerExplanation.text: A round sign means you are approaching a railroad crossing. This sign is posted a few hundred feet in front of the tracks and tells drivers to slow down, look, listen, and prepare to stop.

comment.text: This sign is a warning that you are approaching: | A round sign means you are approaching a railroad crossing. This sign is posted a few hundred feet in front of the tracks and tells drivers to slow down, look, listen, and prepare to stop.

hasPart.name: When driving at night, you should:

about.name: When driving at night, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When driving at night, you should: | When driving at night, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

comment.text: Always use your high beams.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle.

comment.text: Look directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle.
Increase your following distance.
Increase your following distance.

answerExplanation.text: Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

comment.text: When driving at night, you should: | Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

hasPart.name: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are:

about.name: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are:

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: | It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: - Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

suggestedAnswer.text: in need of the space and the bike lane is empty.

comment.text: in need of the space and the bike lane is empty.
Passing another vehicle

suggestedAnswer.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

acceptedAnswer.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: | It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).
